entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Why is #Trump taking #Hydroxychloroquine? An unproven drug! He said he doesn't have #COVID19. He also said his doctor recommended it? What doctor would prescribe an unproven drug to a sitting #USPresident who has no symptoms of a virus?
